items.sentence: Tom smiled at Mary and then she smiled at him.
Tom sometimes helps his mother in the kitchen.
No special equipment is needed to do this job.
Our tent was the only one in the camping area.
My mother and father were both born in Boston.
I realized too late that I needed Tom\'s help.
Tom decided to mosey on over to Mary\'s place.
Tom rarely sings, but I think he will tonight.
Tom read the whole book from beginning to end.
We don\'t get together as often as we used to.
